examples: A good diet is essential for everyone.
It is essential to book in advance.
Ability to sell is essential for the job.
The black is an essential color.
Essential Elements
Free speech is an essential right of citizenship.
I have a grip of the essential facts of the case.
the essentials of the good life
Vitamins are essential for healthy growth.
My personal experience does not corroborate your faith in the essential goodness of people.
Attention to detail is essential in this job.
The ointment may be scented with any essential oil.
The class system is essential to energetic common college life.
Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.

These foods have all of the essential proteins.

funds essential to the completion of the project
The computer laboratory is an essential resource for students.
This form of conflict is essential to Mann's writing.
Knowledge of human anatomy is essential to figure drawing.
Improved rail transport is essential for business.
grups: Инфинитив - инфинитивный оборот с for(После сочетания It is (was, will be) с некоторыми прилагательными)
